weather.summary: Saturday: 9°C, scattered clouds. Sunday: 11°C, overcast clouds

metadata.greeting: Hey George! Get ready for a weekend of amazing adventures! We've found some awesome places where you can see diggers, ride trains, and even visit some dinosaurs! Let's get muddy!

activities.title: Mudchute Farm Adventure
activities.description: Explore London's largest urban farm, home to llamas, sheep, pigs, and more! Perfect for a full day of animal fun.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: Take a DLR train ride (sit at the front!) straight to the farm to see all the animals!

transport.fromHackney: Overground to Shoreditch High Street, then DLR to Mudchute
transport.tip: Sit at the front of the DLR for the best views!

activities.title: Hackney City Farm Fun
activities.description: A charming city farm with pigs, goats, donkeys, and chickens. Enjoy a coffee at the cafe while George explores.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: Lots of friendly farm animals to see, perfect for animal lovers!

activities.title: Olympic Park Adventure
activities.description: Explore the massive playgrounds, including Tumbling Bay (sand and water play) and the Pleasure Garden (splash area in summer). Plenty of space to run around!
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: Huge playgrounds for climbing, running, and getting muddy!

transport.tip: Pack a change of clothes for Tumbling Bay!

activities.title: Discover Children's Story Centre Fun
activities.description: Immerse yourself in interactive storytelling, dressing up, and character visits. A great indoor option for imaginative play.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: Interactive exhibits and dressing up will let George's imagination run wild!

transport.tip: Check the website for character visit schedules.

activities.title: Victoria Park Playground
activities.description: Two great playgrounds, a boating lake, and a deer enclosure offer a variety of activities for a fun day out.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: Two different playgrounds and the chance to see deer!

transport.tip: Take a picnic to enjoy by the lake.

activities.title: V&A East Storehouse Visit
activities.description: Explore visible storage displays and discover fascinating objects from the V&A's collection in this brand new space.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: See all kinds of interesting objects and spark his curiosity!

transport.tip: Look out for family activity trails.

activities.title: Young V&A Playtime
activities.description: Explore design and creativity with hands-on exhibits. There's a dedicated under 5's play area.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: Plenty of hands-on activities to keep him entertained, plus a special area just for little ones!

transport.fromHackney: Bus 26 or Overground to Bethnal Green, then Central Line
transport.tip: Check the website for design workshops.

activities.title: Dino-rific Day at the Natural History Museum
activities.description: Roar with excitement in the Dinosaur gallery with the mighty T-Rex! Explore the Blue Whale in Hintze Hall and discover fascinating wildlife.

transport.fromHackney: Overground to Highbury & Islington, then Victoria Line to South Kensington
transport.parking: Limited street parking, congestion charge applies
transport.tip: Go early to avoid queues for the Dinosaur gallery.

activities.title: London Transport Museum Adventure
activities.description: Climb on old buses and trains, experience a tube simulator, and play in the All Aboard zone. Perfect for transport enthusiasts!
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: He can climb on real buses and trains!

transport.fromHackney: Overground to Highbury & Islington, then Victoria Line to Oxford Circus, then Piccadilly Line to Covent Garden
transport.parking: Limited street parking, congestion charge applies
transport.tip: Pick up a stamper trail for extra fun.

activities.title: Science Museum Fun
activities.description: Explore The Garden (under 5s area), the Flight gallery, and Making the Modern World (TRAINS!). Wonderlab is a paid interactive experience.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: Trains in the Making the Modern World gallery, plus lots of interactive exhibits.

transport.fromHackney: Overground to Highbury & Islington, then Victoria Line to South Kensington
transport.parking: Limited street parking, congestion charge applies

activities.title: Thames Clipper Adventure to Greenwich
activities.description: Enjoy a REAL boat ride along the Thames from Tower Pier to Greenwich. Great views of the city!
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: Boat ride! Sit outside at the back for the best views.

transport.fromHackney: Overground to Shoreditch High Street, then tube to Tower Hill
transport.tube: Tower Hill then boat from Tower Pier
transport.tip: Sit outside at the back for the best views!

activities.title: National Maritime Museum & Greenwich Playground
activities.description: Explore ship galleries and the AHOY! children's gallery (under 7s). Enjoy the great playground outside.

transport.fromHackney: Overground to Shoreditch High Street, then DLR to Cutty Sark
transport.tip: Take the DLR for a fun train ride!

activities.title: Crystal Palace Park Dinosaurs & Playground
activities.description: Discover Victorian dinosaur statues on islands! Also features a farm, maze, and great playground.

transport.fromHackney: Overground to Shoreditch High Street, then train to Crystal Palace
transport.tip: Wear comfortable shoes for walking around the park.

bookAhead.title: Book Ahead
bookAhead.subtitle: Coming up in the next 2-8 weeks

activities.title: Hey Duggee Live
activities.description: Join Hey Duggee and the Squirrels for a fun-filled live show with singing, dancing, and badge-earning!
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: It's Hey Duggee! He loves earning badges!

transport.tip: Book tickets early for best seats.

activities.title: Dinosaur World Live
activities.description: Experience LIFE-SIZE dinosaur puppets in this thrilling and educational show!

transport.tip: Some dinosaurs can be a little scary, so be prepared.

activities.title: Peppa Pig Live
activities.description: Join Peppa Pig and her friends for a sing-along and dance-along live show!

activities.title: Bluey's Big Play
activities.description: See Bluey, Bingo, Mum and Dad as you’ve never seen them before, in this brand-new theatrical adaptation of the Emmy® award-winning children’s television series.

transport.tip: A brand new theatrical show for Bluey fans.

activities.title: The Tiger Who Came to Tea
activities.description: A musical play adapted from the beloved children's book by Judith Kerr.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: A classic story brought to life on stage.

transport.fromHackney: Overground to Highbury & Islington, then Victoria Line to Oxford Circus, then walk
transport.tip: Enjoy afternoon tea before the show!

activities.title: Zog
activities.description: Based on the book by Julia Donaldson and Axel Scheffler.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: A fun, musical adaptation of the popular book.

transport.tip: Book tickets early for best seats.
